full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Request for Standing Offer: Washing Machine and Dry or Steam Cleaning Services

**Reference Number:** WS4053222828-Doc4053294839
**Publication Date:** 2023-06-13
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-07-18T14:00:00 (Expired)

**Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RISO)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Purpose:**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of National Defence (DND) and the Eastern Regional Cadet Support Unit is issuing this Regional Individual Standing Offers (RISO) to supply washing and drying machines, and dry or steam cleaning services for various military clothing and equipment. The services are required for the Montreal and Mauricie region in Quebec, Canada.

**Scope of Work:**
The successful bidder will be required to supply washing and drying machines, and dry or steam cleaning services for various military clothing and equipment, as detailed in Annex A.

**Contract Information:**

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Contracting Entity Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada
* **Contract End Date:** 2025-08-01
* **Notice URL:** http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16570548?extsite=MTY1NzA1NDhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**Eligible Trade Agreements:**

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contact Information:**
Melanie Caty, Procurement Officer
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
Email: [melanie.caty@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:melanie.caty@tp
